dict.acceptation: 用键盘输入；用键盘式排字机排字；
用键盘进行操作；作键盘式排字机排字；

sent.orig: The RID_DEVICE_INFO_KEYBOARD structure defines the raw input data coming from the specified keyboard.
sent.trans: KEYBOARD结构定义了来自特定键盘的原始输入数据。

sent.orig: Keyboard: Top and front edge of keyboard.
Keyboard language was changed or a new keyboard layout was loaded.
sent.trans: 键盘语言被改变了或者新的键盘布局被加载了。

sent.orig: Use your favorite keyboard shortcuts. Internet Explorer and Navigator share many of the same keyboard shortcuts.
sent.trans: 使用您喜欢的快捷键。InternetExplorer和navigator使用的快捷键有很多是相同的。

sent.orig: This keyboard has the same measurements as a standard 102-key keyboard, but there's a big difference.
sent.trans: 这款键盘和102键标准键盘尺寸相同，但是他们之间有个大大的区别。
